revision.text:
==Latin== ===Etymology=== From {{term|sanguis||blood|lang=la}}.
===Adjective=== {{la-adj-1&2|sanguineus|sanguinea|sanguinea|sanguineum|sanguineum}}
# of [[blood]], [[bloody]] # [[bloodthirsty]] # [[blood]]-[[coloured]]
====Inflection==== {{la-decl-1&2|sanguine}}
====Related terms==== * [[sanguis]]
====Descendants==== * English: [[sanguine]], [[sanguineous]] * French: [[sanguin]] * Italian: [[sanguigno]], [[sanguineo]] * Portuguese: [[sanguinho]] * Romanian: [[sânger]] * Spanish: [[sangüeño]], [[sanguíneo]]
[[el:sanguineus]] [[fr:sanguineus]] [[mg:sanguineus]] [[pl:sanguineus]]
